text: Oba temumanyi ng’abatali batuukirivu tebaliyingira mu bwakabaka bwa Katonda? Temulimbibwanga. Abakaba, newaakubadde abasinza bakatonda abalala, newaakubadde abenzi, newaakubadde abasajja abeeyisa ng’abakazi, newaakubadde abalya ebisiyaga,6:9 bamalaaya abasajja n’abasajja abaalyanga ebisiyaga baali bangi mu nsi ya Buyonaani ne mu Baruumi
